test.name: Validate Verify User VR Bank Page

kw.name: Set Environment Variable
kw.doc: Sets an environment variable to a specified value.

kw.name: Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Given that the user should navigate in PEGA Login Page
My Logger
kw.arg: that the user should navigate in PEGA Login Page

kw.name: And user login using valid credentials
Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'user@vrbank' into text field 'xpath://div[@id="credentials"]//div[@class="field user"]//input'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Be Enabled

kw.name: Input Text

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
